alenka_comp.fb0726f7-bcdb-45cb-b823-41004aede842: Stay at base and patrol the perimeter.
alenka_comp.d6b2e88e-2bfd-4493-b4ac-54636c6d8595: Have to stay at the base and patrol the perimeter!
alenka_comp.49a0434f-5725-4031-9310-b257b8bc2d6d: Set aside! There is one more issue to be resolved.
alenka_comp.f5b9c284-65fb-4a5b-95d1-4e131d94fe48: Be on the alert, keep your eyes open.
alenka_comp.93f8da30-e6fa-4bb1-9fd2-6e6010d0c4c6: Now I stay away from the enemy.
alenka_comp.b79ea7c0-9dd8-4fcb-9cdd-ba3559efbb5e: There is to stay close to you!
alenka_comp.d6dcc7b0-1a6d-4206-afde-cb4ac20c3335: Act more actively, chase the enemy.
alenka_comp.576fc935-4135-4af0-9b4d-8109fdfdfc3a: I shoot, but I'm very careful
alenka_comp.28400338-522d-4117-a829-a2cafaf003ca: I shoot, but I try to be careful
alenka_comp.c9bd5078-8457-4541-a7d4-03c082069013: I am treated if I am injured
alenka_comp.a57fd419-57fb-405f-b5d4-7611403f7e26: I am treated if I am slightly injured
alenka_comp.cc19b374-64fb-40df-8328-0d4d8fe1d044: Retreat if you are lightly injured.
alenka_comp.83a18b3f-7e3b-4283-aa6d-73781c981cfa: Get medical treatment if you are injured.
alenka_comp.83e068b7-e2b5-452e-a4f8-d21ddf7821b2: Treat if you are lightly injured.
alenka_comp.6c4a63b2-37c9-4143-b9d3-5f6a7648a881: Wait here, while I reconnoiter the situation.
alenka_comp.56cf4494-2603-429f-b33f-af0d173dacb3: Alyonka, such a thing, further without you. Stay at base. Rest, bring security.
alenka_comp.d154e8ee-d7cc-4f4f-ac26-cb015ecbddd6: Understood the order, commander. Okay, I'm doing it. You... take care of yourself.
alenka_comp.5e53428c-2bec-4c92-b05a-b26d3499ac95: Alyonka, such a thing, further without you. Stay at base. Rest, bring security.
alenka_comp.c7118341-ba7c-4bc4-921d-0d6a134ca61f: Understood the order, commander. Okay, I'm doing it. You... take care of yourself.
alenka_comp.1df090df-2d4a-4200-9d50-292756208a4f: Further without you, return to the base, rest, carry all possible security.
alenka_comp.0b52c648-995f-4fe3-9411-39fdf6cbc8a6: Commander, I do not argue, but let's at least not from here... Let's get to the base, no problem.
alenka_comp.f16109df-69c7-49d3-be56-ffaccbb95285: Okay, then when we get back to base.
alenka_comp.a0cbd994-24d3-4716-a8e0-2c2614a37040: Now I am holding myself closer to you.
alenka_comp.31c9298e-fcea-43b7-a670-5c9ff925b82a: Be more proactive, move without looking back at me.
alenka_comp.6e2aa787-1cbe-411a-95a7-1e76d6ac9fba: Keep your distance, don't get close to the enemy.
alenka_comp.b95d0519-b711-47a5-b028-29ef57d08bb5: Excellent, I will hit with aimed fire.
alenka_comp.926292d6-8a41-4474-8bc2-aaf728b1a3eb: Good. Now I move across the battlefield and chase the enemy.
alenka_comp.a6cc3ea3-aa70-43f5-a6ba-5beb10367bc5: Keep your distance, don't get close to the enemy.
alenka_comp.9299ff86-9520-439a-b3ac-32589122647c: Breathing like that! What did you want, commander?
alenka_comp.424b0b4e-7b83-48f8-bee0-190da6ac7ce9: What do you think of this forest?
alenka_comp.23490317-9886-42ee-8e27-6d64658ca4dd: Nice, but I would stay away from here. I don’t know what shakes the earth, but I don’t think it’s good.
alenka_comp.00bbf421-1e4a-49c7-a574-d10dad955376: We will definitely find out. Another question...
alenka_comp.d93d2a64-9514-4175-aeb1-91c49891715c: Yes, probably. It's nice when there is greenery around. Although it can be seen not far from it.
alenka_comp.6592a251-cdea-49a0-b306-a1aff3a051db: Have you heard interesting stories about this place?
alenka_comp.fc405ef7-215d-4e64-922b-b2ddb4f97988: As usual - about bunkers, the railway... I think you know. I can’t believe it.
alenka_comp.2bd71677-a79f-4329-8cd2-7b58ba3f2f51: I would like to see what is there. Another question...
alenka_comp.10ff0c19-7e5e-494d-b669-433dd9aeecd6: How do you like this place?
alenka_comp.a42cb944-697e-4000-b51a-8031651b3fcf: So so... I think someone lives here. And it is clearly not eating potatoes. Do not be noisy.
alenka_comp.6a8e62fd-e0e3-4343-bfcd-039c60ecd5f8: Do you think these caves are natural or artificial?
alenka_comp.553b3934-e7e4-41cb-acc1-7bf59eb8a410: Do not know. But, I'm afraid they might collapse if we start actively shooting.
alenka_comp.6e16f498-1aec-49a8-a8ad-317454d61d6d: Draft. So there are exits. It's good.
alenka_comp.becbd524-b0af-466c-9bbe-a7390b2f4845: So, here it is - the same 317th... Yes, what?
alenka_comp.1439401b-64a6-44a2-8e02-5ced63875525: What do you think of bunker 317
alenka_comp.5428fea4-f6e6-4781-a53e-e8ddde8591fe: Impressive structure! Just think that they used to know how to build. Even the technique still works!
alenka_comp.7a588287-1a8e-4972-a9ac-53504c927d5b: I wonder if there are many such places in the Wasteland?
alenka_comp.3d0e4516-7e22-475c-8a94-78f820f77340: In our Wastelands, I don’t know. But, in general, there should be many of them on the territory of the Union and not only.
alenka_comp.f9bc4078-9e2c-493b-8fc1-97eb51cc2aaa: Yes, we can only guess. I will also ask...
alenka_comp.2c9f9de9-a244-4516-85f7-a29769920b0d: What do you think was studied here?
alenka_comp.e2060e86-3f85-4ce9-81b8-90adc90b3960: Something they wanted to hide. This means it is very expensive or dangerous.
alenka_comp.b207d177-d271-4002-846b-37ec6040ba4f: It is logical. I will also ask...
alenka_comp.64433bf0-8ecb-486a-9554-d18c347d67cb: It's a curious place... Just ask, commander.
alenka_comp.de62aa92-9a00-47be-8555-d01354c834ef: What do you think of this bunker?
alenka_comp.3cdab222-7a8b-47d0-83d2-02a578274069: I wonder what happened to all the people here? Interrupted each other, or what?
alenka_comp.4bcfc248-7bcf-415a-90bd-e5a89c14b20b: What do you think was studied here?
alenka_comp.ff61f4b7-0a21-4a3d-a2ee-571fbcc8be97: From a place like this... surprisingly calm. Do not understand why.
alenka_comp.fff40fb8-10d0-4e3a-835a-578468455e3b: Good! Anything is better than being on duty.
alenka_comp.8309f96e-6f85-41b2-9558-ca8b7acd3361: Glad to hear. There is another question...
alenka_comp.ab308c61-13aa-4efa-8949-436804e2c61f: Glad to hear that. There is another question...
alenka_comp.e17976fd-ecd3-4c85-b743-d9d02bad5413: What do you think about our operation?
alenka_comp.4edb6022-b68b-4225-b8cd-1b540195aed9: What is there to think... You plan, I do it. I like it - I've seen so many things, impressions will last for the rest of my life.
alenka_comp.51ef299e-9dd4-46ed-8281-f60e11212e85: Keep it up! Here's another thing...
alenka_comp.06807616-5d70-4acd-ba04-4e6c6d2d93bd: I have a question for you.
alenka_comp.8e82e9a8-0a74-4ee8-a274-f5502ddf9a0f: [Alyonka is ready to listen to the order. You notice that she is injured, but does not show it]
alenka_comp.103cd984-ba43-4f4d-bd59-1f6ca65eee40: I have a question for you.
alenka_comp.7156e33e-b629-4461-9837-e666e2ce5b9d: [Alyonka, looks at you inquiringly, with difficulty trying to hide the severe pain]
alenka_comp.6e96593a-baa6-463a-b468-0967feadd404: I have a question for you.

baza_alenka.0535124e-24ba-4c14-acb3-4e1d7291717b: [Your familiar warrior, Alyonka, is busily walking around the village. In her hands she grips her trusty gun, and in her eyes a living fire of energy burns. When she sees you, she salutes]
baza_alenka.febd16ba-ee9d-4b79-b019-dd92e89163ad: How is the service? Not boring?
baza_alenka.b4a8a9bf-142f-4299-a8c3-175cca2fed21: I’m watching. It's quiet so far.
baza_alenka.3128e557-25e5-4da1-969c-7d0eff04a13a: There is a proposal! Do you want to join me in the squad?
baza_alenka.397bc3be-4018-4bd6-b35b-056c68688193: Yes, it would be interesting. What will you need to do?
baza_alenka.79ba984c-a29a-4b19-a295-0dc7921ab602: I have an important task for the Center, I'll tell you on the way. I need an extra barrel and an extra backpack.
baza_alenka.eaa155aa-bf07-4075-b5bc-280fdaee4ca3: O.k. I'm ready. When to start?
baza_alenka.48629fd7-6ee2-43ab-80db-691182b7e880: Wait, I want to ask you something else.
baza_alenka.c3bbad63-e2c0-4c44-8204-d012f656ba6c: Not really yet. My sworn enemy, Styopa Balagan, is temporarily hiding. But I know he hasn't forgotten about me. He will still make itself felt! Then we will fight with him! Straight as before! Hee hee...
baza_alenka.163da51a-00cb-472d-afb2-e449e0068b5f: Glad to talk, but I have to go.
baza_alenka.9e2e1cfe-b23d-4900-b11e-5deac362f8b8: I just wanted your opinion. I will go.
baza_alenka.3bb80f93-ddda-4edc-af63-2cdbf7df7832: I just wanted to know your opinion. I will go.
baza_alenka.21015fd3-14ed-4712-ad2f-1d17f142dad6: What can I say and not ask unnecessary questions.
baza_alenka.8e08d375-cbe9-47d4-b849-a15af66d9a19: Honest and practical. I like! Well, am I in business?
baza_alenka.ff97ea5a-7f3b-44bf-8196-1f6cffd9469e: I have to go. See you!
baza_alenka.8443aff2-bcf0-437b-8be5-9da7bceb6c5d: Not bad here for you! Gozhin ordered me to monitor the situation around the village. So, here I am, I carry all the protection I can. Almost like home, only the grounds are much larger.
baza_alenka.d10277fa-2608-4517-af1a-17d5f4abd07c: Correct solution, but I have a better idea. Do you want to join me in the squad?
baza_alenka.8f34bded-226c-4a17-a86d-d9a95fa4fdc2: It’s necessary. Can you answer a couple of questions?
baza_alenka.0f69eee1-a29f-41c1-90d6-b6e9dd108c97: Hehe, hello! Well, can you answer a few questions?
baza_alenka.79254512-1a94-4e0b-b226-e60924e7c84e: Greetings, but I have to go.

opg_death_galina.52a17343-c331-4265-b92e-87a18d4f1596: Filled up these pretentious worthless slobaks
opg_death_galina.764891b7-20a4-41df-8427-d2b5b3494206: Yes! [Throw the mutilated heads of the former leaders of the organized crime group Death under your feet]
opg_death_galina.d49b8839-3821-4253-b70c-18d46e077a5e:
Shine!
These weaklings don't deserve to live...
opg_death_galina.3466b016-df39-4a10-9ab2-8d0010d77c60: [you look at your interlocutor in bewilderment]
opg_death_galina.c055b5c0-3ca5-42e3-8944-efa27bc09a82:
But there is one more old bastard left in the KRZ.
Fill up the old prude and bring me a souvenir - his ear and we will become the only owners of these lands!
opg_death_galina.624b4d0a-6c51-417b-b770-f12e258093ef: No, I didn't do anything, and in general I was passing by here...
opg_death_galina.690d2e41-6796-4285-8d34-451d15742554: Well let's go. (Attention! You will become an agent of chaos - all living things will need to be wiped off the face of the earth)
opg_death_galina.ff3107e9-cd10-49c6-9896-96344af1c023: Galina Bathory has joined your gang.
opg_death_galina.55bd70b3-02cc-45d4-ab6a-1c3ca0d4aebf: Why do I need your corpse? You are funny. But shout at every corner that "We are Death, We are Chaos!" not worth it. Let's first reconnoiter what's what and get it right.
opg_death_galina.3098f990-0073-4dcc-b57a-1ba82a0d0f4a: I was leaving here on important matters. Do we have a new plan?
opg_death_galina.7c74e06c-45e8-4dcc-9dab-3ad6e2926b6d: Well, like that, we'll tell you later. By the way, the toothy one is with us now. Just call her - Galya, she likes it.

opg_death_galina_teammate.3b974320-9c35-4b6a-97ae-50db16f9dc6a: > Look, I think it's time to kill.
opg_death_galina_teammate.552e93a5-3699-466b-80a0-55a95d4116ea: Finally. I'm always ready. And you?
opg_death_galina_teammate.5dd9cf2f-c4b6-4bb0-9764-002e3be5fe8a: I'm still getting a point. We still need to think.
opg_death_galina_teammate.5c1a5227-5d48-4eae-9a29-2fa8e5544087:
The Cossacks drove from the Don to the house,
Pidmanuli Galya - they took with them...
opg_death_galina_teammate.decd8397-9882-4708-b38d-803b326bddc3: I'll spit in your eye now!
opg_death_galina_teammate.374bd0e9-8476-4937-a3c8-d15d87a31f4b:
Oh, you are Galya, Galya young,
They deceived Galya - they took her with them.

tunnel.comp_2.fa1ef4d5-42cb-4d98-b876-9d012eb3d028: Try to find information about the Gauss project
tunnel.comp_2.30bcdd84-e450-4145-9db5-ad0a95d423ff: [Success] You have found all the blueprints you need.
tunnel.comp_2.6419552d-0c60-45ff-909e-5273ad6cba8a: Attempt to assemble the Gauss Rifle
tunnel.comp_2.2fa88c28-3e29-4ba4-8ead-d9101e9bb257: [Success] You did it! You have assembled the Gauss Rifle and found a way to craft charges for it.
tunnel.comp_2.5882daa4-fffe-4873-9e6c-746a261cc70f: [Failure] You lacked scientific knowledge, perhaps you should re-read the documentation...
tunnel.comp_2.fb406906-c071-4ff1-bbd4-8f092cc6c97f: You do not have all the components, you need to look in military bunkers, as well as in the lair of large attacking cartels.
tunnel.comp_2.6b54df30-c136-4527-b74a-aba822081dc6: [Failure] You could not figure out the flow of endless drawings and formulas, maybe you should re-read the documentation first...

opg.galina.e20c069d-4ae7-4797-af7f-77131ec5954b: Or maybe on a bright day
opg.galina.394b2faa-28e2-4f13-97de-7324733eaead: I will come out of the ambush
opg.galina.82baf771-3a4e-4c8e-9f60-f5e21a3a6fbc: And we will find ourselves together
opg.galina.3783e555-c8e1-4513-a66c-b43365f26301: And if you strangle yourself with fear and longing
opg.galina.927d7f96-3865-43f4-8658-5a561a310fe9: I'll find you anyway and blow your brains out

citysub_simon_shpak.9ab90db9-c5e5-4f91-ba46-4288046e66bd: Tell us about your cartel, where else do you have branches?
citysub_simon_shpak.31205ce6-0bfb-41cd-ad47-987137d981b7: Yes, in all the wastelands: from the Gulch of Troubles to the Dead City and even in Peregon
citysub_simon_shpak.ec584052-cc48-4fd9-8418-f5e6917322ed: Great, well, I have to go
citysub_simon_shpak.d6452709-305e-4936-944f-6d591f32f6e5: Great, I have a couple more questions

harbor_ticketman.9472b70f-36c3-481c-9734-01b62d45f310: Perhaps you have some unsolved problems, I'm looking for a part-time job
harbor_ticketman.98dbf515-d4b4-441d-b938-8bbfc14bffc1: Perhaps I have a little assignment for someone like you who travels a lot.
harbor_ticketman.67ec2656-46e8-4f7a-8531-63a9f4cccdd6: The payment is not big, but the order is not difficult either - you need to find out what is happening in a place called the Tunnel of Death
harbor_ticketman.5279fd6f-01ca-47fb-939a-23d3c4c3fe97: Then tell me why, except for you, no one from the stalkers returned from there?
harbor_ticketman.a15aaa28-f7f9-4c97-bd6f-3bcf32e3c5bb: Of course, because toxic fumes, terrible radiation and huge radioactive monsters are spilling out there.
harbor_ticketman.ac42c16d-a70c-46b5-bcaa-e90d29005e48: [Give the official a note from a dead stalker]
harbor_ticketman.eff2a68e-96e8-485c-ba4a-a883fcf4e8f8: Now it’s clear, here’s for your efforts, 200 rubles and a few cartridges that remained from the past seekers of adventures, I think they will no longer need them
harbor_ticketman.de50abac-2bf6-4737-9076-9147e70c3a0c: Thank you, I have to go again
harbor_ticketman.40ca95e7-d222-4497-932d-dce4255a53e2: You need to find out why, stalkers go there and never return, and if you find useful records, be sure to let me know
harbor_ticketman.c4de3ed5-c09f-4b94-932e-72042f2583f7: With pleasure I will take a walk to new places [Mark on your map - Tunnel of death]
harbor_ticketman.2713956f-92c9-4cbf-a010-23a78295277a: Did you find out why no one comes back from there?

gauss_book.6bd73ed9-b064-4d5c-8d70-631b4050d0ec:
[Now you begin to understand - these records keep the key to the most powerful weapon]
This book contains some strange notes about the study of electromagnetic fields and coherent radiation. You are not in a position to make out what is written about here, but it talks about the collateral discovery of the super powerful effect of electromagnetic induction and about the prototype of a new weapon, which is named after the great physicist Johann Karl Friedrich Gauss. You also managed to understand that more detailed information is located on the technical missile base on military servers.
gauss_book.a74b9e05-ec51-4725-94a1-e030d59e3001: Your Technology Comprehension Skill has increased by 150 (but not for long)
gauss_book.8b7ef5f2-74da-4e86-8fe6-6d80f0b08fff:
This book contains some strange notes about the study of electromagnetic fields and coherent radiation. You are not in a position to make out what is written about here, but it talks about the collateral discovery of the super powerful effect of electromagnetic induction and about the prototype of a new weapon, which is named after the great physicist Johann Karl Friedrich Gauss. You also managed to understand that more detailed information is located on the technical missile base on military servers.
(Obviously, a lot of energy will be needed, it is better to start filling up with batteries)

village_bum.10994469-0df1-4197-a2e7-84a984719928:
Certainly!
Bring 2 bottles of all spirits (except port) and 1 bottle of moonshine and don’t forget the fly agaric
village_bum.1e5432e9-b641-4fb8-b89c-fbe0952fe860: A man hands you a very creepy bottle with a cloudy liquid, this can be used only just before death, but it’s better not
village_bum.352a5904-63e7-417c-b04d-3d5a2c0166c2: Thanks! I'll go to the bar - I'll clean someone's snout
village_bum.1d11a7d2-199e-436a-85e3-d17917e4077d: It is clear how I will find - I will look
village_bum.4ce4e219-43c0-4b73-a900-1395e929aaa1: Checking the moonshine still, I know the secret recipe for the coolest liquor in the entire wasteland - Bummer!
village_bum.5d1585e1-a2e4-4105-8d95-dfe128096bd1: Enough! All who want to forget themselves in gambling, striving for spiritual beauty, working faces try to fill each other in the dark

village_wallguard.d7218f65-9095-4555-84ee-7ccda306f2e1: Can we figure it out for two?
village_wallguard.0ebab133-ac3e-4586-a9c6-0ca787d1ad6d: You plunked by the fire and having heard many folk wisdoms - you learned to move around settlements much faster

zippo.b824a45f-5ac6-4893-b7c2-500126030091: Diesel fuel is needed for a fire
zippo.2cebbcd4-0b92-4050-a8b2-5d9ef1b4c33c: You need wood for a fire
zippo.9134abf2-af51-44ee-aee7-b6e2c1189e9c: An ax is needed for a fire
